relatedBlades.copy:
ANALYST REPORT

# Cloudflare named the leader in the Frost Radar Global Content Delivery Network, 2023 report According to Frost & Sullivan, "__Cloudflare sets the fastest pace in developing new products and features that drive value and performance__" as the leading innovator in the CDN space. Cloudflare is one of only 15 vendors recognized in the report. Read the report to get Frost & Sullivan's assessment where Cloudflare is: - Helping companies to accelerate cloud-based business operations and optimize end-user experiences - Saving users tremendously on egress costs - Leveraging AI to optimize its network and route traffic Register for this report to learn more.

![Frost Radar Global Content Delivery Network 2023 ](//cf-assets.www.cloudflare.com/slt3lc6tev37/7by6ULJZNChfM4zX90ZUhl/14a7267852e4fea9700bfb0ef28b39e9/Cloudflare_CDN_Image_-1.png) *Cloudflare's dot placement is indicative of being best positioned to lead the industry in both growth & innovation.
